reuters.title: AUSIMONT COMPO <AUS> SELLS UNIT
reuters.body: Ausimont Compo NV said it has sold the assets of its Equipment and Machinery Division for about six mln dlrs to an investment group including the unit's management, resulting in a modest pretax gain that will be included in first quarter results. The unit had sales of five mln dlrs in 1986. Reuter 
